title: Enchanting Raani Haar - A Symphony of Diamonds, Emeralds, and Sapphires
materials: Teardrop Cut). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting lustre and shine.
features: Intricately designed Raani Haar showcasing floral motifs and geometric patterns. The necklace features a central pendant with a large, vibrant Emerald surrounded by pink stones. Cascading Sapphires add depth and dimension. The setting is a mix of bezel and prong setting to highlight the individual beauty of each gemstone. Filigree detailing adds a touch of old-world charm.
colors: and blue (sapphires). The combination creates a rich
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (vivaha)
and milestone celebrations. Ideal for brides seeking a statement piece that embodies both tradition and elegance. Also suitable for Seemantham and other significant family events.
description: This Raani Haar is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The use of high-quality diamonds, emeralds, and sapphires ensures brilliance and lasting value. The Hyderabadi polish and intricate filigree detailing reflect the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry making. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
